id: Decide to explore the world in search of the past.

onSuccess.displayText:
Hearing the truth laid bare before him, {Player} knew in his heart that he wanted, no, needed to know the full truth of his discovery as a baby. With a heavy heart, he told his mother his plans to leave the kingdom in search of answers.

”My dearest son,”She responded,”As your mother, I love and cherish you with all my heart and want nothing more than your happiness, even if it means letting you leave the nest. However, as the Queen of {Kingdom#Name}, you are the only heir in line to the throne, should you leave and are unable to return, {Kingdom#Name} would have no heir to look toward the future, and I would be left in grief for both you and the kingdom. Are you truly certain this is the path you wish to take?”
choices: ”The needs of the kingdom outweigh the needs of the one”
